name: Boss Life 3D
description:
Welcome to our game and your first super cool day as a boss!

Sometimes, work life is boring. But in our game, it is not! Because here, you are the only boss.
Go to the office and enjoy life!

There are multiple levels you can experience. Hire/Fire an employee, throw papers to your colleagues to wake them up or investigate new CVs.
And that's not only it. There are much more you can do.
Download and start enjoying the game!
